original: pubbe sāsavaṁ …pe… saṁyojaniyaṁ ganthaniyaṁ oghaniyaṁ yoganiyaṁ nīvaraṇiyaṁ parāmaṭṭhaṁ upādāniyaṁ …pe… saṅkilesiyaṁ pacchā asaṅkilesiyaṁ katanti?
analyzed: pubbe sa āsavam pe sayojaniyam ganthaniyam oghaniyam yoganiyam nīvaraṇiyam parāmaṭṭham upādāniyam pe saṅkilesiyam pacchā asaṅkilesiyam katanti

original: Atthi koci tathāgatassa sāsanaṁ navaṁ karotīti?
analyzed: atthi koci tathāgatassa sāsanam navam karoti iti
atthi koci satipaṭṭhāne navam karoti iti

original: atthi koci pubbe akusalaṁ pacchā kusalaṁ karotīti?
analyzed: atthi koci pubbe akusalam pacchā kusalam karoti iti

original: atthi koci pubbe sāsavaṁ …pe… saṅkilesiyaṁ pacchā asaṅkilesiyaṁ karotīti?
analyzed: atthi koci pubbe sa āsavam pe saṅkilesiyam pacchā asaṅkilesiyam karoti iti

original: Labbhā tathāgatassa sāsanaṁ puna navaṁ kātunti?
analyzed: labbhā tathāgatassa sāsanam puna navam kātunti
labbhā sati paṭṭhānā puna navam kātunti

original: labbhā pubbe akusalaṁ pacchā kusalaṁ kātunti?
analyzed: labbhā pubbe akusalam pacchā kusalam kātunti

original: labbhā pubbe sāsavaṁ …pe… saṅkilesiyaṁ pacchā asaṅkilesiyaṁ kātunti?
analyzed: labbhā pubbe sa āsavam pe saṅkilesiyam pacchā asaṅkilesiyam kātunti
